item.title: Valeo CEO on Earnings, Impact of US Auto Tariffs
item.description: Christophe Perillat, chief executive offcer of Valeo SA, speaks on Bloomberg Television about earnings and the impact of US auto tariffs on the firm’s business. Valeo designs and manufactures automobi
